title: [Bug] Cannot seem to upload attachments
body:
Hello, using Firefox or Chrome, I cannot seem to upload a simple .png file to a post of mine. I've actually uploaded this specific file before to another post.

Can get to 'start upload' but it simply does not progress past 0%. I've given it about 2-3 minutes each time.

replies.body: This was broken but we rolled a fix for it this week. You should be able to add attachments again. Sorry about that!
Yup, I can confirm it's working! Thank you!
I can attest to this. .jpegs, as well.
